item.description:
Hello All,

March is almost here and our meetup is back to our regularly scheduled times. Please don't forget to update the location you will be attending. I would like to increase the number of individuals allowed to rsvp, but that can not be done without your help.
So, please make sure to annotate a location.

See you all next month.
-Susana


Locations:

1. Doggie Day -- 400 Tremont Street in Boston
2. Paws for a Cause - 10:30am -- 1386 Beacon Street in Brookline (Coolidge Corner)
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua March Meetup
